participant_1.background:
Social media is not my thing.
I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.
I remember playing with my pet fox in the backyard when I was a child.
i love dragons.
I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a great source of entertainment when I'm not rock climbing.
my brother is currently couch surfing at my house.
I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself.
I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid.
I don't have any kids because I'm focused on my career.

content.text: How is your day going so far?
It's going good so far! Just got back from rock climbing.
That sounds fun! I've never been rock climbing before.
Oh, you should try it! It's a lot of fun and you get a great workout!
Maybe I will! I'm not very outdoorsy, but I'm sure I could give it a try.
I'm sure you'd like it! What are your hobbies?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
I love to read too! I just finished reading a book about Tupac Shakur.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never read anything about him before.
He was a really talented artist and an inspiration to a lot of people.
I'll have to check out his music.
You definitely should! He was one of the best rappers of all time.
Thanks for the recommendation! I think I'm going to start a rock climbing club at my school.
That's a great idea! I'm sure a lot of people would be interested in joining.
I hope so! I think it would be a lot of fun.
I'm sure it would be! Let me know if you need any help getting started.
